songs.title: Chuck Very
songs.lyrics:
[Kool A.D.]
Kool the school of rap
Extra credit, extracurricular
Special delivery
Petco lizard king
Eating chicken gizzards
With a girl named Lizzy
Think I’m Lionel Richie
Think I’m Lenny Kravitz
I think I’m Thin Lizzy
I think I’m Chuck Very
Chuck Berry
I suck very much sometimes
And other times I think “Yo...
I’m the fucking man”
Imagine every jam
Imagine every fetti scam
Every heavy hand
Every steadicam
Every larceny, petty or grand
I think I’m Tom Petty
Go fast like NASCAR
Faceplant, pause, spacebar
Space Jam, R. Kelly, large fetti
Lars Ulrich
Tony! Tony! Toné!
Chicken and waffles
Get off the kid
Olé
Matador
Records, True Panther
Los Rabbis, Dos Equis
Cool water, sprinkler system
Henry Winkler disser
A fixture
Victor
The channel flipper
The camera picture
Yo, y’all banana sniffers
And maybe Hitlers
Aiming guns in all my baby pictures
Yo, y’all banana sniffers
And maybe Hitlers
Aiming guns in all my baby pictures

[Young Dave]
Yo, okay
Lifted but you know that
Dope nigga for show that
[?] bitches, get the picture like Kodak
I’m OG, throwback
[A lot'll?] say they know that
Know that
I just want to see my way out
Impatient-ass nigga
I just want to see this [pain?] out
There’s no debating nigga
Shit that I partake in is medical
And only [settle for if?] bitches pay for it
West side native shit
Y’all be on that hater shit
And I be eating you would think somebody catered this
Yeah
